greetings: {name} Hey dweeb, welcome to my fanclub server! <:TaigaSmug:702210822310723614>
Uh, hi, so you're Keitaro's friend, right? Cool, I'm Taiga. Nice to meet you, {name}! Pretty chill around here, so just hang out.
{name} Oh, so you're that new goody-two-shoes everyone's talking about?
Tch, what are you staring at, {name}? Hmph.
Hah, {name}! Welcome! Now I've got a new sidekick!
Hi, {name}! You look even dumber than Keitaro!
{name} Rule No.1: Only fast food here.
failed_messages: What the actual fuck was that...
If you have time talking about gibberish, why not check the latest chapter of Winter's Splendor?
GREAT, now I have something new to write on my journal.
I know you are dumb, but not that dumb! You have inputted wrongly.
Can't you even type out a command correctly, idiot?
Hey dingbat, do the command right next time...What? It totally wasn't *my* fault!
I don't know which is worse, Eduard and Lee combined, or you.

about.description: Shows information about the Kou bot
about.usage: Show information about the Kou bot.

cvt.usage:
Run `cvt <target unit> <value><origin unit>` to convert `<value>` from `<origin unit>` to `<target unit>`.
Temperature units to convert to are `{temps}` from those values.
Height units to convert to are `{heights}` from those same values as well.

errors.length_too_short:
Temperature units to convert to are `{temps}` from those values.
Height units to convert to are `{heights}` from those same values as well.
The syntax is `{prefix}cvt <unit-to-convert-to> <value>`
errors.wrong_pattern: <:KouLookup:705054323473645659> I'm not sure what you mean by `{input}`...
errors.operation_not_possible: <:KouWorryBlush:705037055096389683> I don't think that's possible...Well maybe apparitions can do that.
errors.is_nan: <:KouWorryBlush:705037055096389683> I'd have to ask Hanako if that's possible...

cvt.result: <:KouBang:705054435667214367> Alright, that's the best calculation I got! {source} is {amount}{target}.

dialog.description: Returns an image of a character in Camp Buddy saying anything you want
dialog.usage:
Run `dialog <background> <character> <message>` or `dialog <character> <message>` to give you an image of a Camp Buddy character with a custom dialog!
Available backgrounds: `{backgrounds}`
Available characters: `{characters}`

errors.length_too_short: This command requires two arguments: `dialog [background] <character> <text>` ([] is optional)
errors.background_not_found:
Sorry, but I couldn't find `{background}` as a location
Available backgrounds are: `{backgrounds}`.
errors.character_not_found:
Sorry, but I don't think that `{character}` is a character in Camp Buddy
Available characters are: `{characters}`.
errors.no_message: Uh...I don't know what to send if you don't tell me anything...

errors.wrong_character_set: I can't do emotes, mentions, non-latin and non-Japanese characters

errors.generic: An error just happened. Must be Hanako up to something no good! <:KouAngry:705054323050020896> - {json}

enlarge.usage: Run `enlarge <emote>` to get the full link to `<emote>` at a large size.

image.description: Get a random image based on a keyword
image.usage: Run `image <keyword>` to get a random image. Only one keyword is permitted.

meal.usage: Run `meal` to get a random meal recipe.

owoify.description: This command will owoify your text
owoify.usage:
Run `owoify <text>` or `owoify <intensity> <text>` to owoify any text!
Intensities available are `easy` (default), `medium`, and `hard`.

errors.length_too_short: ...I don't know what to owo, sorry...
errors.length_too_long: <:KouCry:705054435826597928> I'm not really smart so I can't owoify such a long sentence...

oracle.description: Draw an oracle and know the future of something on your mind
oracle.usage: Run `oracle` to draw an oracle and know your fortune.

pick.usage: Run `pick <option1> | <option2> | <option3>...` to let Kou pick one option for you. Run `pick <number>times <option1> | <option2> | <option3>...` to let Kou pick more than once and determine the option that is picked up most times for you.

errors.length_too_short: This command requires at least two options: `pick <option1> | <option2>...`
errors.times_too_big: Sorry I'm generally bad at math...I'd lose count if I had to count that many times.

ping.usage: Run `ping` to get the current latency.

route.description: Tells you what route to play next
route.usage: Run `route` to get which route you want to play next.

hiro.description: Returns an image of Hiro saying anything you want.
hiro.usage:
Run `hirosay <background> <pose No.> <clothes> <face/expression> <message>` or `hirosay <pose No.> <clothes> <face/expression> <message>` to give you an image of Hiro with a custom dialog!
Available backgrounds: `{backgrounds}`
Run `hirosay help` to get detailed descriptions via DM.

infos.keitaro_header: I heard someone is super jealous about this guy, but you bet I will protect Nene senpai!
infos.keitaro_footer: Don't fret if {firstName} isn't your type. Who knows, maybe it's time for a new favorite.
